Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey led the charge with 26 points, but six players went on to finish the game in double figures.
Cade Cunningham notched his first triple-double of the regular season with 17 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists.
Anthony Davis notched a game-high 37 points, and LeBron James finished with 20 points and 11 assists.
Bench scoring was a key factor as the Lakers were only able to produce 10 points from their second unit, while the Pistons got 27 points from their bench.
